Test Name: T-Cell Receptor Gene Rearrangement Analysis by PCR
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, bone marrow aspirate, FFPE tissue, fresh tissue
Purpose: To detect clonal T-cell populations by analyzing TCR gene rearrangements for the diagnosis and monitoring of lymphoproliferative disorders.
Container: EDTA tube (blood/bone marrow), FFPE block or slides (tissue), sterile container with buffer or saline (fresh tissue)
Equipment: Thermal cycler, gel electrophoresis apparatus, UV transilluminator
